title: proc-macro2 fails to build (for target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu)
body:
Building for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu a program that depends on proc-macro2.
The build environment is setup via buildroot. Rust v1.39 is used.

This is the output when compiling:

``` 
>>> rust-server 0.2 Building
PATH="/aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/bin:/aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/sbin:/home/jonathan/.nvm/versions/node/v10.16.0/bin:/home/jonathan/.cargo/bin:/home/jonathan/.local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:/snap/bin" CARGO_HOME=/aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo cargo build --release --target=aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --manifest-path=/aprojects/buildroot-core/output/build/rust-server-0.2/Cargo.toml
warning: unused manifest key: package.edition
   Compiling proc-macro2 v1.0.8
   Compiling generic-array v0.12.3
   Compiling getrandom v0.1.14
   Compiling net2 v0.2.33
   Compiling time v0.1.42
   Compiling num_cpus v1.12.0
   Compiling iovec v0.1.4
   Compiling rand v0.4.6
error[E0432]: unresolved import `std`
  --> /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/getrandom-0.1.14/src/error_impls.rs:13:5
   |
13 | use std::io;
   |     ^^^ help: a similar path exists: `self::std`

error[E0432]: unresolved import `libc`
  --> /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/getrandom-0.1.14/src/util_libc.rs:18:13
   |
18 |         use libc::__errno_location as errno_location;
   |             ^^^^ maybe a missing crate `libc`?

error[E0432]: unresolved import `libc`
   --> /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/getrandom-0.1.14/src/util_libc.rs:103:13
    |
103 |         use libc::open64 as open;
    |             ^^^^ maybe a missing crate `libc`?

error[E0432]: unresolved import `unicode_xid`
 --> /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/proc-macro2-1.0.8/src/strnom.rs:5:5
  |
5 | use unicode_xid::UnicodeXID;
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^ maybe a missing crate `unicode_xid`?

error[E0432]: unresolved import `unicode_xid`
  --> /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/host/share/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/proc-macro2-1.0.8/src/fallback.rs:16:5
   |
16 | use unicode_xid::UnicodeXID;
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^ maybe a missing crate `unicode_xid`?

error: aborting due to 3 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0432`.
error: Could not compile `getrandom`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0432`.
error: Could not compile `proc-macro2`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
make: *** [package/pkg-generic.mk:241: /aprojects/buildroot-core/output/build/rust-server-0.2/.stamp_built] Error 101
```
